channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Strategy Questions
item.description: My new book (out today) contains more than 500 questions. Here are some to get you started:

item.title: The challenge of focus groups for bold ideas

item.title: Foundering or floundering?
item.description: Floundering is flopping around and making little progress. A Dutch word for getting mired and lost. Foundering is what we call it when the ship goes d...

item.title: Pricing Agility: The Key To Navigating Economic Turbulence
item.description: As we continue to navigate economic instability, it's time for businesses to consider pricing as a strategic tool for weathering economic uncertainty.

item.title: Confused about good
item.description: How often do we assume that popular things are good, and that good things become popular? If your work doesn’t catch on, does that mean it wasn’t good...

item.title: Where Have All The Sawfish Gone? Join The Hunt To Find Out!
item.description: National Sawfish Sighting Week calls for citizen scientists to join the hunt for one of the world’s most endangered species.

item.title: Grow Faster And Smarter With Data-Driven Business Decisions
item.description: Given the significant benefits of an insight-driven culture, this article explores how to implement one in your business.

item.title: Understanding Virtualized Kubernetes For A Modern IDP

item.title: Moving toward ease
